title: Update About heading text and add Industry 4.0 card to Solutions page

requirements.summary: Rename the selected About page heading span to exactly “About Us” without changing any other text.
acceptanceCriteria: The selected heading span renders the exact text "About Us" (case and spacing match).
No other headings or page text are changed as part of this rename.

file_operations.description: Ensure the first <h1> child <span> (the heading span corresponding to the provided XPath) renders exactly "About Us", and verify no other page text is altered.

requirements.summary: Add an Industry 4.0 solution card to the Solutions page using the existing card design and ensure it appears last with default filters, matching the Home page Industry 4.0 content.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /solutions shows an "Industry 4.0" card in the solutions grid.
The Industry 4.0 card uses the same card component styling and interactions as the other Solution cards on the Solutions page.
The Industry 4.0 card content (title/description/detailed content/feature list/applications/category/icon) matches the Industry 4.0 item used on the Home page "Our Solutions" section.
With default filters (search empty, category = all), the Industry 4.0 card appears as the last item in the grid.

file_operations.description: Add the Industry 4.0 service definition (matching the Home page "Our Solutions" Industry 4.0 item) to the exported services list and place it as the last array item; include its icon import (Factory) so it renders with the same ServiceCard design on /solutions.

Refactor the Home page "Our Solutions" section to source Industry 4.0 content from the shared services content (so the Industry 4.0 card content exactly matches between Home and /solutions) while keeping the existing grid/card rendering.
